title: War Blanket
description: The city is on its knees, drowning in flood water, middle management, counterfeit cigarettes and USB desk toys. The heat is unbearable, and the enigmatic 'War Blanket' is on everybody's lips. When a series of prophetic visions show it buried in the ice, a young couple head to the frozen 'New North' to find it.
author: Samuel Astbury
